lexUnit.name: face.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the surface of a thing, especially one that is presented to the view or has a particular function.

sentence.text: Mrs Kelleher looked up to the yellow face of the kitchen clock .
13 With the help of your clock face , draw diagrams to show the following .
A look of horror appeared on the Campbell 's clock face .
The seconds crawl past as if they were anchored to the clock face .

Rough hewn steps led up steeply , hugging an almost sheer cliff face .
